nodes.bodyText: rs is declared to null but never set again
may be rs = pstmt.executeQuery() at line 97
I think we can remove daoGeneOptimized parameter and declared it inside getGenes method
may be a comment explaining why just one gene is added to canonicalGenes
any reason to return empty set when condition fails?
True, maybe null is more appropriate.
